sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Merck & Co. ( MRK ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.5%.
Year to date, Merck & Co. registers a 11.9% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 0.3%.
Procter & Gamble is lower by about 2.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.2%, and Boeing ( BA ), trading up 0.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
